name: files-mcp
description: MCP server for sandboxed file access. Provides read, search, write, and manage operations with checksum-based safety and line targeting.

tools.name: fs_read
tools.description: Read files or list directories. Returns line numbers and checksums needed for editing.

tools.name: fs_search
tools.description: Find files by name and search file contents.

tools.name: fs_write
tools.description: Create or update files in the sandboxed filesystem. IMPORTANT: Always call fs_read first to get the checksum. Line-based targeting with dryRun preview.

tools.name: fs_manage
tools.description: Structural operations for files and directories: delete, rename, move, copy, mkdir, stat.

FS_ROOT.title: Root Directory
FS_ROOT.description: The directory that the agent will have access to. All file operations are sandboxed within this directory.
